summary: In fiscal year 2015, DOD spent $274 billion on contracts for products and services. Some of this money was used on incentive contracts to achieve specific outcomes, such as lower costs or tighter time frames. title: Defense Contracting: DOD Needs Better Information on Incentive Outcomes
